data.title: Word Finder
data.statement:
You must output the number instances of the search word found in a block of text.

Only count instances (with matching adjacent letters) that are across or down, no reverse or diagonals.

data.stubGenerator:
read F:word(10)

read H:int

write Answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> Word [[F]] to find
<<Line 2:>> Integer [[W]] width of text block
<<Line 3:>> Integer [[H]] height of text block
<<Next [[H]] lines:>> String of [[W]] characters for each row
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> Number of occurrences of the word [[F]] in the text block

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You must output the number instances of the search word found in a block of text.

Only count instances (with matching adjacent letters) that are across or down, no reverse or diagonals.
Input
Line 1: Word F to find
Line 2: Integer W width of text block
Line 3: Integer H height of text block
Next H lines: String of W characters for each row
Output
Line 1: Number of occurrences of the word F in the text block
Constraints
2 ≤ Length of F ≤ 10
3 ≤ W,H ≤ 10
Example
Input
CAT
3
3
UCN
YAX
ETJ
Output
1
